contents.text: Welcome to Heap, the analytics platform that automatically captures every user interaction across web, mobile, and cloud.
Press 1 to speak with our Sales team for pricing, demos, and tailored solutions.
Press 1 to schedule a live demo with our Solutions Engineering team.
Please hold while we connect you to a Solutions Engineer for your live demo.

navigationGoals: Book a live demo with a Solutions Engineer to see Heap in action
Schedule a live demo with a solutions engineer to see how Heap can track engagement in my veteran mentorship program
Book a live demo with a Solutions Engineer to explore Heap's event taxonomy and data capture workflows.
I’d like someone to show me a live demonstration of how Heap works so I can follow along easily.
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Heap can analyze user interactions for my research.

contents.text: Press 2 for pricing, licensing options, and subscription details.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team for pricing and subscription support.

navigationGoals: Obtain a breakdown of Heap's pricing tiers and subscription plans
Get pricing and subscription details for using Heap analytics in my nonprofit veteran outreach app
Request details on enterprise licensing tiers and subscription pricing models for Heap.
I need to review the different subscription plans and find out how much I’ll pay each month.
I need details on subscription plans and pricing options suitable for a student research project.

contents.text: Press 2 for Customer Support and account assistance with your Heap integration.
Press 1 for technical support with your web, mobile, or cloud data integrations.
Please hold while we connect you to our Technical Support team.

navigationGoals: Fix a technical problem with my web or mobile data integration in Heap
Troubleshoot my Heap web integration to fix data collection for my veteran career portal
Troubleshoot my web SDK integration to resolve custom event tracking errors.
I need simple technical help installing Heap’s tracking code on my site—I’m not very familiar with computers.
I’m having trouble integrating Heap’s tracking code into my web app for my physics experiment.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing inquiries and account management assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing and Account Management team.

navigationGoals: Clarify my recent invoice charges and update my billing information
Review my billing invoice and adjust my subscription tier for my veteran support dashboard
Update my billing payment method and get an itemized breakdown of my latest invoice.
I need to update my billing information on my account and check my latest invoice.
I need to update billing information and review my invoices for my student account.
